title: Half-Elf
content:
them has their own special characteristics.

BG3 Full Game Note: In the full launch of Baldur's Gate 3, Ability Score Points for Races that were present in Early Access are removed. And instead, Ability Score Points in the full game correspond with the Class players will choose.

Curious, ambitious, and versatile, half-elves are welcome everywhere, but struggle without a community to call their own.

Half-Elf Traits in Baldur's Gate 3

Base Racial Speed: Move up to 9m per turn. Civil Militia: Pr
